question.label: NQMOB37
question.text: Are you able to get on and off the toilet?

question.label: NQMOB30
question.text: Are you able to step up and down curbs?

question.label: NQMOB26
question.text: Are you able to get in and out of a car?

question.label: NQMOB32
question.text: Are you able to get out of bed into a chair?

question.label: NQMOB25
question.text: Are you able to push open a heavy door?

question.label: NQMOB33
question.text: Are you able to run errands and shop?

question.label: NQMOB31
question.text: Are you able to get up off the floor from lying on your back without help?

question.label: NQMOB28
question.text: Are you able to go for a walk of at least 15 minutes?
